I need some help
GLD: I would be more than happy to help out!

I placed an order a while ago, around Christmas time and it never shipped. Then I called gld and it shipped my pendant, but not the earrings since they were out of stock. I think they are back in stock, but I am supposed to have store credit to use since I never got a refund. How do I use my store credit I have?
GLD: Thanks for explaining the issue. For your store credit, please check your spam and promo folders as well, as our emails sometimes end up there. Let me know if you find it there.
It's not there

GLD: Thank you for checking. As my system is limited to general product information, please let me check with my team, and I'll get back to you as soon as I get an update. To help with this, may I also ask for your order number and email address?

DreamCloud: I'm so sorry for the frustration! That's definitely not our intention. Promotions can vary based on timing and eligibility.
Signing up for SMS alerts ensures you're the first to know about new promotions, exclusive offers, and limited-time sales.

However, if you'd prefer not to receive any more messages from us, just let me know and I'll be glad to coordinate this for you!
